snippet: Rob Gronkowski’s emphatic way of celebrating his touchdowns for the Patriots has renewed fans’ enthusiasm for the spike, and inspired scientific interest in its impact.
abstract: New England Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski’s emphatic way of celebrating his touchdowns for the Patriots has renewed fans’ enthusiasm for the spike, and inspired scientific interest in its impact.

byline.contributor: Ben Shpigel and Sam Borden contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Rob Gronkowski’s emphatic way of celebrating his touchdowns for the Patriots has renewed fans’ enthusiasm for the spike, and inspired scientific interest in its impact.

headline.seo: Rob Gronkowski’s Spiking Resurrects an N.F.L. Art
